tool_description: Simple endpoint that return Ibovespa listed Stocks prices (with a delay up to 15 minutes)
name: Simple Ibovespa Stocks
title: Simple Ibovespa Stocks

api_list.name: ListTickers
api_list.description: List all available tickers for query
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-ibovespa-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/stocks/tickers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-ibovespa-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-ibovespa-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/stocks/tickers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-ibovespa-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetStocks
api_list.description: Get up to 5 stocks data from each request

required_parameters.name: stocks
required_parameters.description: Each stock must be separated per comma (,).
